name: Bent
description:
How do you all plan on repairing anything if all your nails are all out of whack???

In this little game, you fix nails! Please let me know what you think, I was going for a quick little mobile game vibe, or perhaps a mini game about fixing fences?

How to play:

Click, and hold to drag out the strength of the hammer. Imagine you are selecting where to hit, and then you are lifting the hammer out and away from there. The longer the drag, the stronger and broader the hit! But be careful, with great power yadda yadda yadda...

Future plans:
  • I already have it to where it will get harder over time, but it didn't make it into this build (sad), but I'd like to update that in there! 
  • I would also like to berid of the percentage on the bottom in exchange for a shader that highlights the bad parts.
  • Maybe even a mobile release yo.

Made proudly with Unity3D and Bolt by Ludiq!
